name: Just a NIGHTMARE (real_p0wer)
description:
Just a NIGHTMARE is a short escape game with puzzles

Stroy

You wake up in a creepy jail and you manage to get out. Only to find yourself in a house with a bomb and you have to figure your way out through puzzles.  Is it just a nightmare?

Controls

WASD to move. 

Ctrl to Crouch. 

Shift to run. 

Mouse to look around. 

E to Interact.
